title: Tomsen
subtitle: A test strategy for a banking application

content.text:
Tomsen is a project I completed during my software tester training. My task was to design the entire test strategy. This included the requirement review, the test case document with the planned schedule for test scenarios, as well as a document describing the overall test strategy.

To create these documents, I had a mockup of the application (see carousel) and the list of functional specifications (see below) at my disposal.
